events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected. I would like to return it and get a refund.
System identified the customer issue as a refund request related to order dissatisfaction.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Sarah to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry the product didn't meet your expectations. I'll assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the product is unopened and in the original packaging for the return?
The order number is 987654321. The product is unopened and still in the original box, so I hope it qualifies for a full refund.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use the prepaid return label sent to your email to return the product.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the product back today.
We have received your returned product and processed the refund to your original payment method. You should see it reflected within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The refund issue has been successfully resolved and the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support.
